analyzed: 'du byed yongs su dag pas gso ba yongs su dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The complete purity of healing and the complete purity of the supports for miraculous ability are without duality and not discriminated.

translated: They are not two but indivisible, and there are no distinctions to be made between them.🔽“The complete purity of a person is the complete purity of the tactile sensations that arise from the contact of the mind.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pas skyes bu yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pas skyes bu yongs su dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /

translated: the complete purity of a person and the complete purity of the sensation that arises from the condition of tongue contact are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

translated: “The complete purity of a person is the complete purity of the sensation that arises from the condition of body contact.

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pas skyes bu yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: The complete purity of the sensation that arises from the condition of body contact is the complete purity of a person.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su dag pas skyes bu yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purity of the person and the purity of the feeling that arises from the causal conditioning of the coming together of mental processes—these are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they differentiated, nor are they distinct.
